attributes.action: **END SECOND HOME ALLOWANCES** and use the £13m+/yr to fund a 'hotel' for MP's use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why allow each MP to claim for a second home when the general population are struggling with just one? The £13m+/yr could easily fund a single 'hotel' that MPs must use when visiting London. When additional capacity is required then rent rooms from 'partner' hotels. Simples.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
